analyzed: vuttam ha etam bhagavatā vuttam arahatā iti me suta

original: “Idhāhaṁ, bhikkhave, ekaccaṁ puggalaṁ paduṭṭhacittaṁ evaṁ cetasā ceto paricca pajānāmi:
analyzed: idha aha bhikkhave ekaccam puggalam paduṭṭha cittam evam cetasā cetaḥ paricca pajānāmi

original: ‘imamhi cāyaṁ samaye puggalo kālaṁ kareyya yathābhataṁ nikkhitto evaṁ niraye’.
analyzed: imamhi ca ayam samaye puggalo kālam kareyya yathābhatam nikkhittaḥ evam niraye

original: Cetopadosahetu kho pana, bhikkhave, evam’idhekacce sattā kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā apāyaṁ duggatiṁ vinipātaṁ nirayaṁ upapajjantī”ti.
analyzed: cetas upadosa hetu kho pana bhikkhave evam idha ekacce sattā kāyassa bhedā param maraṇā apāyam duggatim vinipātam nirayam upapajjanti iti

original: Ayampi attho vutto bhagavatā, iti me sutanti.
analyzed: ayam pi atthaḥ vuttaḥ bhagavatā iti me sutam ti
